[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”right” admin_label=”Button” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”11px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”rgba(177,255,177,0)” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”4px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_padding=”8px|32px|8px|32px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#156573″ button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_border_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”124px|0px|29px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”62px” header_letter_spacing=”-1.25px” header_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” header_font_size_tablet=”42px” header_font_size_phone=”32px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” header_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” header_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

Build exceptional products with the world’s most creative team.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/careers/#open-positions” button_text=”View Open Positions” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Help us change the way the world works together.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”100px|0px|58px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”38px” max_width=”60%” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We believe in doing great work with great people. But we try not to take ourselves too seriously. No egos or office politics, just a team of smart and supportive people committed to learning and improving.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ max_width=”60%” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]We get a buzz from seeing our revenue grow each month, but we’re truly driven by building great products that our customers love. We’re obsessed with helping our customers achieve their business goals, and we’re quietly transforming the way the world communicates.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/brightscout-team.png” parallax=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”38px” background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/team-bg.svg” background_size=”contain” background_position=”top_left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Brilliant Work with Brilliant People

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ max_width=”15%” height=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We really take pride in hiring the best people. Our hiring and vetting process is rigorous not because that’s what our clients expect but because we want to build the future or “next big thing”.

There’s not a single person in the team that I don’t enjoy working with. It’s the people that make Brightscout. The people are the culture.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Confidence in Approach

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Creative Director

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”58px|0px|58px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||16px” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Everything you need to be at your best

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]Focus on building amazing products and delighting our customers, we’ll take care of the rest.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”89%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”89%” max_width_tablet=”80%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Open Ideas” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Open-Ideas.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

We understand that the best work gets done in a respectful and open work environment. Strictly no pain in the asses allowed.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Continued Learnings” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Continued-Learning.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

We hold lunch & learns, team summits, and an open flow knowledge sharing to ensure that we’re always learning from one another.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Creative Environment” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Creative-Environment.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

Located right in the heart of Austin, TX we have the ideal spot to start discussions and  get work done.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Talented Teams” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Talented-Team.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

We’ve built a world-class team of idea-makers, creators, and mad scientist, all driven to deliver the best products for you.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/careers-image-grid@2x.png” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ custom_margin=”||16px” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Values in Action

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”15%” height=”0px” custom_margin=”||” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]Our values are the basis for how we work and act. So it’s only natural for the benefits we offer to be an extension of our values.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”40px||40px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Personal Development” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Personal-Development.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Everyone has a yearly budget for personal growth and development.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Custom Equipment” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Custom-Equipment.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]We want you to work at your best, so we’ll supply what you need to make it happen.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Flexible Work Hours” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Flexible-Work-Hours.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]We believe work should fit around your life, and the flexibility to work from home.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”40px||40px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Unlimited Vacation” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Unlimitted-Vacation.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”]We know you’ll be more productive if you have perspective and rest.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Paid Paternity” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Paid-Paternity.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Family is really important to us, so we provide enhanced paid leave for new parents.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Free Lunches” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Free-Lunches.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Get your grub on. Tell us what you want for the week and we’ll make it happen.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”40px||40px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Paid Incentives” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Paid-Incentives.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”]You’re helping us grow, so we want to make sure you’re part of our business and our journey.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Weekly Happy Hour” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Weekly-Happy-Hour.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Enjoy a weekly ‘happy hour’ where you can chat and play games with other team members.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Idea Incubator” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Idea-Incubator.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Every other Wednesday our Product Team takes time to work on their own projects.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ Job Opportunities

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]Want to help us help companies unlock their full potential by building conversational apps? Are you eager to grow professionally? Check out our open positions below.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.0″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” module_id=”open-positions” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”58px|0px|100px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”48px|48px|48px|48px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dde8e6″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” link_font=”||||||||” link_text_color=”#54b454″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Services Company Our Work Careers Blog Build exceptional products with the world’s most creative team.Help us change the way the world works together.We believe in doing great work with great people. But we try not to take ourselves too seriously. No egos or office politics, just a team of smart and supportive people committed to […]
